idea-plugin.name: Extract JSON Tags
idea-plugin.description:
Extract JSON Tags is a plugin for GoLand that allows you to easily construct JSON bodies that correspond to a given struct type. It relies on json tags to construct the request.

Basic Usage

Given the following type...

type Example struct {
    Email       string `json:"email"`
    PhoneNumber string `json:"phone_number"`
}

...right-click on the type name (i.e. Example) and choose "Extract JSON Tags". The following JSON string will be copied to your clipboard:

{
    "email": "",
    "phone_number": ""
}

action.description: Extract the JSON tags from the selected type struct
